entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch made a chirruping noise to Mrs. Norris, indicating he is present in the scene.

entities.name: norris
entities.description: Mrs. Norris stared blankly at Harry for a few more seconds before turning and following her master, indicating she is present in the scene.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry heard Snape walking away down the corridor; Filch handed Moody the egg and disappeared from view too, muttering to Mrs. Norris, indicating he is present in the scene.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape walked away down the corridor, indicating he is present in the scene.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody placed his staff on the bottommost stair and started to climb laboriously toward Harry, a dull clunk on every other step, indicating he is present in the scene.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves was mentioned by Filch as being up to something, indicating he is relevant to the scene.
